content.question: The graph of <math alttext="f prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, the derivative of the continuous function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, is shown above on the interval <math alttext="negative 8 is less than x, which is less than 7 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. The graph of <math alttext="f prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> has horizontal tangent lines at <math alttext="x equals, negative 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="x equals, negative 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="x equals 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="x equals, 6.3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and a vertical tangent line at <math alttext="x equals, negative 4 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. On which of the following intervals is the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> both decreasing and concave up ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 8 comma 0, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 4 comma 7, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 6 comma negative 3, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 4 comma 6.3, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>6.3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> only

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 4 comma negative 3, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 4 comma 6.3, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>6.3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> only

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 8 comma negative 6, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 3 comma 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 6.3 comma 7, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6.3</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> only

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 8 comma negative 6, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 3 comma 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 6.3 comma 7, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6.3</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> only

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
